tasks.title: Initial Filmmaker Meeting
tasks.description: Sit-down with director & producers to align on creative vision, audience, and tone.

tasks.title: Market Positioning & Target Audience Definition
tasks.description: Define competitive positioning, core selling proposition. Segment audiences by demographics and psychographics.

tasks.title: Competitive Release Landscape Analysis
tasks.description: Map competing summer releases: tentpoles, same genre, counter-programming.

tasks.title: Campaign Strategy Deck & Presentation
tasks.description: Compile positioning, audience research, and recommended approach into strategy deck.

tasks.title: Ongoing Filmmaker Check-Ins
tasks.description: Weekly touchpoints with director to review materials and maintain alignment.

tasks.title: Preliminary P&A Budget Development
tasks.description: Build initial $45M P&A budget framework based on projected $200M+ domestic gross.

tasks.title: Budget Finalization & Approval
tasks.description: Lock final P&A budget. Secure executive and studio head approval.

tasks.title: Materials & Asset Management
tasks.description: Centralized tracking of all creative assets across departments and territories.

tasks.title: Teaser Trailer Production
tasks.description: 90-second teaser establishing tone and spectacle without major plot reveals.

tasks.title: Teaser Trailer Debut & Distribution
tasks.description: Super Bowl debut, coordinated social media rollout, paid amplification.

tasks.title: Theatrical Trailer Production
tasks.description: Full 2:20 theatrical trailer â€” the most important marketing asset.

tasks.title: Trailer Music Licensing
tasks.description: Commission custom trailer music and license sync rights for hero tracks.

tasks.title: Filmmaker Trailer Approval Process
tasks.description: Formal approval cycles with director per contractual creative rights.

tasks.title: International Trailer Versioning
tasks.description: Adapt domestic trailer for international markets and ratings boards.

tasks.title: TV Spot Production: :60 Spots
tasks.description: Produce 60-second spots for premium broadcast placement.

tasks.title: TV Spot Production: :30 Spots
tasks.description: Multiple :30 versions targeting different demographics.

tasks.title: Digital-First Video Creative
tasks.description: 6-second bumpers, vertical video for TikTok/Reels/Shorts.

tasks.title: Talent Photo Shoot
tasks.description: Dedicated cast photo shoot for key art and press materials.

tasks.title: Teaser One-Sheet Design
tasks.description: Initial teaser poster establishing the film's visual identity.

tasks.title: Final One-Sheet (Payoff Poster)
tasks.description: Definitive theatrical poster for all advertising and exhibition.

tasks.title: Outdoor & Transit Creative Adaptation
tasks.description: Adapt key art for billboards, bus shelters, subway dominations.

tasks.title: Baseline Awareness & Interest Study
tasks.description: Quantitative research establishing baseline awareness and interest levels.

tasks.title: Trailer Testing (Quantitative)
tasks.description: Test teaser with recruited audiences: purchase intent, emotional response.

tasks.title: Ongoing Tracking Studies
tasks.description: Weekly tracking: awareness, first choice, definite interest.

tasks.title: Media Strategy & Channel Planning
tasks.description: Channel mix, flighting schedule, reach/frequency targets for $45M spend.

tasks.title: National TV Buy (Broadcast & Cable)
tasks.description: Negotiate national TV buy across broadcast, cable, and connected TV.

tasks.title: Paid Social Media Advertising
tasks.description: Execute paid campaigns across Meta, TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat.

tasks.title: EPK Production
tasks.description: BTS footage, cast interviews, b-roll, hi-res stills, bios.

tasks.title: Long-Lead Press Campaign
tasks.description: Exclusive features in Vanity Fair, Empire, Total Film 4-6 months before release.

tasks.title: Premiere Event Planning
tasks.description: World premiere: red carpet, press line, screening, after-party.

tasks.title: Launch Official Social Media Profiles
tasks.description: Create @EclipseRisingMovie across Instagram, TikTok, X, YouTube.

tasks.title: Social Media Content Calendar
tasks.description: Multi-month content plan: reveals, BTS, cast takeovers, countdown.

tasks.title: Official Film Website Build
tasks.description: Dedicated film website with trailer embed, ticketing integration, SEO.

tasks.title: Release Date Selection
tasks.description: July 17, 2026 locked after competitive analysis of summer calendar.

tasks.title: Theater Booking & Screen Count
tasks.description: Negotiate with AMC, Regal, Cinemark for 4,200+ screens opening weekend.

tasks.title: Premium Format Allocation
tasks.description: Secure IMAX, Dolby Cinema, ScreenX, 4DX bookings.
